Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.description: -t byfn.sh -h|--help (print this message) -m - one of 'up', 'down', 'restart' or 'generate' - 'up' - bring up the network with docker-compose up - 'down' - *bring up the network with docker-compose up* - 'restart' - *bring up the network with docker-compose up* - 'generate' - generate required certificates and genesis block -c - channel name to use (defaults to "mychannel") -t - CLI timeout duration in microseconds (defaults to 10000) {quote} >
